ingredients: 1 quart fresh strawberries, hulled, 1 (9 inch) pie crust, baked, 1 cup white sugar, 3 tablespoons cornstarch,   +   3/4 cup water,   +   1/2 cup heavy whipping cream
nutrition: Total Fat 11g 14%, Saturated Fat 5g 26%, Cholesterol 20mg 7%, Sodium 109mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 42g 15%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 29g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 45mg 226%, Calcium 26mg 2%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 147mg 3%
